QuestData.Title: The Power of Poison
QuestData.Description: G.V.? We need a full name. A location!$B$BI have an idea fer how we can find those out.$B$B<Hulda pulls out a small vial.>$B$BThis is my last vial o' wracking poison. We use it when we need tae extract information from prisoners.$B$BCoat yer weapon wi' it and head into the Shattered Hand camp just ahead. Engage them as normal and demand answers - the poison will take care o' the rest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Interrogate Shattered Hand orcs in the Harvesting Pits to find out the name and location of "G.V.".
QuestData.CompletionText: This is no time to be havin' a moral dilemma. We need answers tae complete our mission.
QuestData.RewardText: Gardul Venomshiv, eh? He's good as dead.

Objectives.Objective: Name and location of G.V. learned
